SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_invest_record a LEFT JOIN tcim_fee b ON a.invest_id = b.bill_id AND b.fee_type = '1001' WHERE a.`status` = 1 AND b.profit_cfplanner_id = #{userId} AND a.create_time > DATE_FORMAT(#{readTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT count(*) FROM tcim_product_repayment_record a WHERE a.user_id IN (SELECT i.user_id from tcrm_investor i where i.cfplanner=#{userId}) AND a.repayment_time > DATE_FORMAT(#{readTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
SELECT count(t.id) FROM tcim_fee t WHERE ( t.fee_type = '1001' OR t.fee_type = '1002' ) AND t.profit_cfplanner_id = #{userId} and t.create_time >= '${date}'
SELECT SUM(t.invest_amt) FROM tcim_product_invest_record t WHERE t.platfrom = #{orgNumber} AND DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m')
SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT invest_id FROM tcim_product_invest_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT invest_id FROM tcim_product_unrecord_invest WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) a

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.platform_id FROM ( SELECT o.org_number, COUNT(i.platfrom) investPlatformCount FROM tcim_org_info o LEFT JOIN tcim_product_invest_record i ON o.org_number = i.platfrom AND i.user_id = #{userId} WHERE o.`status` = 1 AND o.org_fee_type = #{model} AND o.org_gray_status = 0 AND o.org_isstaticproduct = 0 GROUP BY o.org_number HAVING investPlatformCount = 0 ) a LEFT JOIN tact_repayment_redpacket_pool r ON a.org_number = r.platform_id ) a WHERE a.platform_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(invest_id) FROM tcim_product_invest_record WHERE platfrom=#{platfromId} AND user_id=#{userId}

(DATE(i.end_time)=#{date} AND
